name: Ozone-depleting emissions index - EEA
title: Ozone-depleting emissions index - EEA
description: Data represents the consumption of ozone-depleting substances (in ozone-depleting potential tonnes), measured as an index relative to emissions in the year 1986 (1986 = 100).

sources.name: Ozone-depleting emissions index - EEA
sources.additionalInfo: Data represents the consumption of ozone-depleting substances (in ozone-depleting potential tonnes), measured as an index relative to emissions in the year 1986 (1986 = 100).
